entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 10.
